attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The bbc has exhibited a long-standing record of campaigning against the values of it's licence-payers, that's why it continues to receive more complaints than it can cope with. We need the bbc to to be managed by a "bbc trust" that reflects the concerns of it's licence-payers and not one which is based on it's bias, i.e. feminism and multi-culturalism.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
